name: UrbaNest
desc: UrbanNest, a MERN stack platform, offers property listings, user authentication, property search, and detailed descriptions for buying, selling, or renting.

name: Vasibuy
desc: VashisBuy, a MERN stack e-commerce site, offers secure authentication, diverse products, seamless payments, and real-time order tracking.

name: Temperature Converter
desc: The Temperature Converter is a MERN stack web app for quick conversions between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin, featuring a simple and intuitive interface.

name: VashiSpendr
desc: VashiSpendr, a MERN stack finance app, helps users track expenses, set budgets, and analyze spending patterns for better financial planning.

name: Stopwatch
desc: Stopwatch is a basic web application that allows users to start, stop, and reset a timer.

name: Image Viewer
desc: Image Viewer is a web application that allows users to upload and view images.
